column.name: booking_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM main.bookings WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM main.users WHERE email = 'test@mail.ru') AND coworking_id = (SELECT id FROM main.coworkings WHERE name = 'Зал 1') AND date = CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day')
